# isCollapsed

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that controls the visibility of the candidate list.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isCollapsed: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the candidate list is collapsed and not visible to the user.

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Handling collapsible behavior

- **allowsCollapsing**: A Boolean value that specifies whether the item can be collapsed.
